about_the_game:
Get ready for a bubble-bursting bonanza through time in Pang In Time!

It's like your favorite arcade classic with a time-traveling twist!

Grab your trusty harpoon gun and smash those pesky bubbles as you journey through wacky worlds, from the prehistoric pang-aea, to pyramids, ancient Rome and a futuristic space station.

  • Bubble-Bursting Mania: Blast, pop, and ricochet your way through a kaleidoscope of crazy levels!

  • Time-Traveling Shenanigans: Get warped through time and witness hilarious anachronisms – dinosaurs with jetpacks, anyone?

  • Power-Up Palooza: Collect mind-bending power-ups that'll turn you into a bubble-bursting superhero!

  • Friends Mayhem: Challenge your friends to be the level king!

  • Pang-tastically Funny: Laugh your bubbles off with quirky characters!

Are you ready to experience the most pang-tastic, time-warping adventure of your life? Download Pang In Time now and let the bubble-bursting mayhem begin!
detailed_description:
Get ready for a bubble-bursting bonanza through time in Pang In Time!

It's like your favorite arcade classic with a time-traveling twist!

Grab your trusty harpoon gun and smash those pesky bubbles as you journey through wacky worlds, from the prehistoric pang-aea, to pyramids, ancient Rome and a futuristic space station.

  • Bubble-Bursting Mania: Blast, pop, and ricochet your way through a kaleidoscope of crazy levels!

  • Time-Traveling Shenanigans: Get warped through time and witness hilarious anachronisms – dinosaurs with jetpacks, anyone?

  • Power-Up Palooza: Collect mind-bending power-ups that'll turn you into a bubble-bursting superhero!

  • Friends Mayhem: Challenge your friends to be the level king!

  • Pang-tastically Funny: Laugh your bubbles off with quirky characters!

Are you ready to experience the most pang-tastic, time-warping adventure of your life? Download Pang In Time now and let the bubble-bursting mayhem begin!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 and upwards
  • Processor: both
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 and upwards
  • Processor: both
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

name: Pang in Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and upwards
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and upwards
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Blast bubbles through time! Pang In Time is a hilarious arcade adventure. Pop bubbles in wacky worlds with dinosaurs, spaceships & more!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
